verses.verse: When the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, whose <S%H776>land<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee, and thou <S%H3423>succeedest<s%> them, and <S%H3427>dwellest<s%> in their <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and in their <S%H1004>houses<s%>; succeedest: Heb. inheritest, or, possessest

Thou shalt <S%H914>separate<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> for thee in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of thy <S%H776>land<s%>, which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

Thou shalt <S%H3559>prepare<s%> thee a <S%H1870>way<s%>, and divide the <S%H1366>coasts<s%> of thy <S%H776>land<s%>, which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> giveth thee to <S%H5157>inherit<s%>, into three <S%H8027>parts<s%>, that every <S%H7523>slayer<s%> may <S%H5127>flee<s%> thither.

And this is the <S%H1697>case<s%> of the <S%H7523>slayer<s%>, which shall <S%H5127>flee<s%> thither, that he may <S%H2425>live<s%>: Whoso <S%H5221>killeth<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbour<s%> <S%H1097>ignorantly<s%> <S%H1847><s%>, whom he <S%H8130>hated<s%> not in <S%H8543>time<s%> <S%H8032>past<s%>; in: Heb. from yesterday the third day

As when a man <S%H935>goeth<s%> into the <S%H3293>wood<s%> with his <S%H7453>neighbour<s%> to <S%H2404>hew<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>, and his <S%H3027>hand<s%> fetcheth a <S%H5080>stroke<s%> with the <S%H1631>axe<s%> to cut <S%H3772>down<s%> the <S%H6086>tree<s%>, and the <S%H1270>head<s%> <S%H5394>slippeth<s%> from the <S%H6086>helve<s%>, and <S%H4672>lighteth<s%> upon his <S%H7453>neighbour<s%>, that he <S%H4191>die<s%>; he shall <S%H5127>flee<s%> unto <S%H259>one<s%> of those <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and <S%H2425>live<s%>: head: Heb. iron helve: Heb. wood lighteth: Heb. findeth

Lest the <S%H1350>avenger<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H7291>pursue<s%> the <S%H310>slayer<s%> <S%H7523><s%>, <S%H3588>while<s%> his <S%H3824>heart<s%> is <S%H3179>hot<s%>, and <S%H5381>overtake<s%> him, because the <S%H1870>way<s%> is <S%H7235>long<s%>, and <S%H5221>slay<s%> <S%H5315>him<s%>; whereas he was not <S%H4941>worthy<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%>, inasmuch <S%H3588>as<s%> he <S%H8130>hated<s%> him not in <S%H8543>time<s%> <S%H8032>past<s%>. slay: Heb. smite him in life in: Heb. from yesterday the third day
Wherefore I <S%H6680>command<s%> thee, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thou shalt <S%H914>separate<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> for thee.

And if the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7337>enlarge<s%> thy <S%H1366>coast<s%>, as he hath <S%H7650>sworn<s%> unto thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and <S%H5414>give<s%> thee all the <S%H776>land<s%> which he <S%H1696>promised<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> unto thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>;

If thou shalt <S%H8104>keep<s%> all these <S%H4687>commandments<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> them, which I <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day<s%>, to <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, and to <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H3117>ever<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways<s%>; then shalt thou <S%H3254>add<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> more for thee, beside these <S%H7969>three<s%>:

That <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> be not <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H7130>in<s%> thy <S%H776>land<s%>, which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, and so <S%H1818>blood<s%> be upon thee.

But if any <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H8130>hate<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbour<s%>, and lie in <S%H693>wait<s%> for him, and rise <S%H6965>up<s%> against him, and <S%H5221>smite<s%> him <S%H5315>mortally<s%> that he <S%H4191>die<s%>, and <S%H5127>fleeth<s%> into <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H411>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>: mortally: Heb. in life

Then the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H7971>send<s%> and <S%H3947>fetch<s%> him thence, and <S%H5414>deliver<s%> him into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1350>avenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%>, that he may <S%H4191>die<s%>.

Thine <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall not <S%H2347>pity<s%> him, but thou shalt put <S%H1197>away<s%> the guilt of <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that it may go <S%H2895>well<s%> with thee.

Thou shalt not <S%H5253>remove<s%> thy <S%H7453>neighbour's<s%> <S%H1366>landmark<s%>, which they of old <S%H7223>time<s%> have <S%H1379>set<s%> in thine <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, which thou shalt <S%H5157>inherit<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

<S%H259>One<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> shall not rise <S%H6965>up<s%> against a <S%H376>man<s%> for any <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, or for any <S%H2403>sin<s%>, in any <S%H2399>sin<s%> that he <S%H2398>sinneth<s%>: at the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses<s%>, or at the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses<s%>, shall the <S%H1697>matter<s%> be <S%H6965>established<s%>.
If a <S%H2555>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> rise <S%H6965>up<s%> against any <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H6030>testify<s%> against him that which is <S%H5627>wrong<s%>; that: or, falling away

Then <S%H8147>both<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%>, between whom the <S%H7379>controversy<s%> is, shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H8199>judges<s%>, which shall be in those <S%H3117>days<s%>;

And the <S%H8199>judges<s%> shall make <S%H3190>diligent<s%> <S%H1875>inquisition<s%>: and, behold, if the <S%H5707>witness<s%> be a <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%>, and hath <S%H6030>testified<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%> against his <S%H251>brother<s%>;

Then shall ye <S%H6213>do<s%> unto him, as he had <S%H2161>thought<s%> to have <S%H6213>done<s%> unto his <S%H251>brother<s%>: so shalt thou <S%H1197>put<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1197>away<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> you.

And those which <S%H7604>remain<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear<s%>, and <S%H3372>fear<s%>, and shall <S%H3254>henceforth<s%> <S%H6213>commit<s%> no more <S%H1697>any<s%> such <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> you.

And thine <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall not <S%H2347>pity<s%>; but <S%H5315>life<s%> shall go for <S%H5315>life<s%>, <S%H5869>eye<s%> for <S%H5869>eye<s%>, <S%H8127>tooth<s%> for <S%H8127>tooth<s%>, <S%H3027>hand<s%> for <S%H3027>hand<s%>, <S%H7272>foot<s%> for <S%H7272>foot<s%>.
